title: Shvarko
author: Shvarko
content: I used to do mining on video cards. I really want to continue mining, now on ASIC under ETC. It is impossible to buy on the official website. Where can I really buy e9 pro safely in China or America up to $3500?

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: Shvarko on March 08, 2023, 05:02:41 PMI used to do mining on video cards. I really want to continue mining, now on ASIC under ETC. It is impossible to buy on the official website. Where can I really buy e9 pro safely in China or America up to $3500?use alt coin section not this one.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=160.0or try this seller in marketplace https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5042442.msg46437721#msg46437721

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Shvarko on March 08, 2023, 05:02:41 PMI used to do mining on video cards. I really want to continue mining, now on ASIC under ETC. It is impossible to buy on the official website. Where can I really buy e9 pro safely in China or America up to $3500?If you visit China, then a lot of ASICs are sold at retail in shopping centers in Shenzhen. Delivery to my country costs 2 dollars per kilogram of weight and I also need to pay a customs duty of 15% of the cost of the equipment.But it is better to search first in local groups for miners.
